typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_ts} as integer,
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as timestamp,
		genre as string,
		id as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as short,
		runtime as short,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		tier as short,
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['movies/**']) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(actors, actors),
	mapColumn(
		{_attachments},
		{_etag},
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_ts},
		availabilityDate,
		genre,
		id,
		rating,
		releaseYear,
		runtime,
		streamingAvailabilityDate,
		tier,
		title,
		name = actors.name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(SourceSystemId = 1,
		releaseYear = toLong(releaseYear)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['onlineMoviesFlattened'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		SourceSystemId,
		SourceSystemMovieId = id,
		SouthridgeMovieId = id,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate = availabilityDate,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate = streamingAvailabilityDate,
		Genre = genre,
		Title = title,
		Rating = rating,
		RuntimeMinutes = runtime,
		TheatricalReleaseYear = releaseYear,
		ActorName = name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as integer,
		ReleaseDate as integer,
		OnlineMovieID as string,
		SourceSystemId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> onpremisescombinedmovies
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string,
		SourceSystemId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> onpremisescombinedmovieactors
source(output(
		SourceSystemId as integer,
		SourceSystemMovieId as string,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		Genre as string,
		Title as string,
		Rating as string,
		RuntimeMinutes as short,
		TheatricalReleaseYear as long,
		ActorName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> onlinemovies
onpremisescombinedmovies, onpremisescombinedmovieactors join(onpremisescombinedmovies@OnlineMovieID == onpremisescombinedmovieactors@OnlineMovieID,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemMovieId = onpremisescombinedmovieactors@MovieID,
		Title = MovieTitle,
		Genre = Category,
		Rating,
		RuntimeMinutes = RunTimeMin,
		TheatricalReleaseYear = ReleaseDate,
		ActorId = ActorID,
		SouthridgeMovieId = onpremisescombinedmovieactors@OnlineMovieID,
		ActorName,
		ActorGender = Gender,
		SourceSystemId = onpremisescombinedmovieactors@SourceSystemId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
onlinemovies derive(SouthridgeMovieId = SourceSystemMovieId,
		ActorId = 0,
		Gender = "NA",
		SourceSystemId = toString(SourceSystemId),
		RuntimeMinutes = toLong(RuntimeMinutes),
		TheatricalReleaseYear = toLong(TheatricalReleaseYear)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 derive(PhysicalAvailabilityDate = currentDate(),
		StreamingAvailabilityDate = currentDate(),
		SourceSystemId = toString(SourceSystemId),
		RuntimeMinutes = toLong(RuntimeMinutes),
		TheatricalReleaseYear = toLong(TheatricalReleaseYear)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemId,
		SourceSystemMovieId,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate,
		Genre,
		Title,
		Rating,
		RuntimeMinutes,
		TheatricalReleaseYear,
		ActorName,
		SouthridgeMovieId,
		ActorId,
		Gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2, DerivedColumn2 join(Select2@SouthridgeMovieId == Select1@SouthridgeMovieId
	&& lower(Select2@ActorName) == lower(Select1@ActorName),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
ConditionalSplitOnlineMovies@NotNull derive(CatalogId = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumn3
Select3 split(not(isNull(ActorId)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitOnlineMovies@(NotNull, Null)
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemId = Select2@SourceSystemId,
		SourceSystemMovieId = Select2@SourceSystemMovieId,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate = Select2@PhysicalAvailabilityDate,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate = Select2@StreamingAvailabilityDate,
		Genre = Select2@Genre,
		Title = Select2@Title,
		Rating = Select2@Rating,
		RuntimeMinutes = Select2@RuntimeMinutes,
		TheatricalReleaseYear = Select2@TheatricalReleaseYear,
		ActorName = Select2@ActorName,
		SouthridgeMovieId = Select2@SouthridgeMovieId,
		ActorId = Select1@ActorId,
		Gender = ActorGender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['finalOnlineCatalog'],
	mapColumn(
		SourceSystemId,
		SourceSystemMovieId,
		SouthridgeMovieId,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate,
		Genre,
		Title,
		Rating,
		RuntimeMinutes,
		TheatricalReleaseYear,
		ActorName,
		ActorId,
		ActorGender = Gender,
		CatalogId
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> finalOnlineMovieCatalog
ConditionalSplitOnlineMovies@Null sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emptyActorId'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as integer,
		ReturnDate as integer,
		RentalCost as decimal(19,4),
		LateFee as decimal(19,4),
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelTransactionsSr
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelMovieMapSr
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeTransactionSr
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieMapSr
VanarsdelTransactionsSr, VanarsdelMovieMapSr join(VanarsdelTransactionsSr@MovieID == VanarsdelMovieMapSr@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID = VanarsdelTransactionsSr@MovieID,
		RentalDate,
		ReturnDate,
		RentalCost,
		LateFee,
		RewindFlag,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(SourceSystemId = 3,
		RentalDate = toDate(concat(left(toString(RentalDate), 4), '-', left(right(toString(RentalDate),4), 2), '-', right(right(toString(RentalDate), 4), 2)), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
		ReturnDate = toDate(concat(left(toString(ReturnDate), 4), '-', left(right(toString(ReturnDate),4), 2), '-', right(right(toString(ReturnDate), 4), 2)), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
		RentalCost = toDecimal(RentalCost),
		LateFee = toDecimal(LateFee)) ~> DerivedColumn1
FourthCoffeeTransactionSr, FourthCoffeeMovieMapSr join(FourthCoffeeTransactionSr@MovieID == FourthCoffeeMovieMapSr@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID = FourthCoffeeTransactionSr@MovieID,
		RentalDate,
		ReturnDate,
		RentalCost,
		LateFee,
		RewindFlag,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(SourceSystemId = 2,
		RentalDate = toDate(concat(left(toString(RentalDate), 4), '-', left(right(toString(RentalDate),4), 2), '-', right(right(toString(RentalDate), 4), 2)), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
		ReturnDate = toDate(concat(left(toString(ReturnDate), 4), '-', left(right(toString(ReturnDate),4), 2), '-', right(right(toString(ReturnDate), 4), 2)), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
		LateFee = toDecimal(LateFee),
		RentalCost = toDecimal(RentalCost),
		RewindFlag = toBoolean(toString(RewindFlag)),
		CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(UpdatedDate)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['combinedOnPremTransactions'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as integer,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelMovieSr
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelMovieMap
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as short,
		ReleaseDate as date 'MM-dd-yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieSr
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieMap
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelMoveActors
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelActorsSr
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieActorsSr
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeActorsSr
DerivedColumnToHandleReleaseDate, VanarsdelMovieMap join(VanarsdelMovieSr@MovieID == VanarsdelMovieMap@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		MovieID = VanarsdelMovieSr@MovieID,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
FourthCoffeeMovieSr, FourthCoffeeMovieMap join(FourthCoffeeMovieSr@MovieID == FourthCoffeeMovieMap@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		MovieID = FourthCoffeeMovieSr@MovieID,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
VanarsdelMoveActors, VanarsdelMovieMap join(VanarsdelMoveActors@MovieID == VanarsdelMovieMap@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		MovieActorID,
		MovieID = VanarsdelMoveActors@MovieID,
		ActorID,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
SplitOnlineMovieId2@NotNull2, VanarsdelActorsSr join(SplitOnlineMovieId2@NotNull2@ActorID == VanarsdelActorsSr@ActorID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Join4 select(mapColumn(
		MovieActorID,
		MovieID,
		ActorID = SplitOnlineMovieId2@NotNull2@ActorID,
		OnlineMovieID,
		ActorName,
		Gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 derive(SourceSystemId = 3) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn2, DerivedColumn3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Select1 derive(SourceSystemId = 3,
		ReleaseDate = year(ReleaseDate)*10000+month(ReleaseDate)*100+dayOfMonth(ReleaseDate)) ~> DerivedColumn2
Select2 derive(SourceSystemId = 2,
		ReleaseDate = year(ReleaseDate)*10000+month(ReleaseDate)*100+dayOfMonth(ReleaseDate)) ~> DerivedColumn3
FourthCoffeeMovieActorsSr, FourthCoffeeMovieMap join(FourthCoffeeMovieActorsSr@MovieID == FourthCoffeeMovieMap@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join5
Join5 select(mapColumn(
		MovieActorID,
		MovieID = FourthCoffeeMovieActorsSr@MovieID,
		ActorID,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
SplitOnlineMovieId@NotNull, FourthCoffeeActorsSr join(SplitOnlineMovieId@NotNull@ActorID == FourthCoffeeActorsSr@ActorID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join6
Join6 select(mapColumn(
		MovieActorID,
		MovieID,
		ActorID = SplitOnlineMovieId@NotNull@ActorID,
		OnlineMovieID,
		ActorName,
		Gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
Select6 derive(SourceSystemId = 2) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn4 union(byName: true)~> Union2
VanarsdelMovieSr derive(ReleaseDate = toDate(ReleaseDate, "MM-dd-yyyy")) ~> DerivedColumnToHandleReleaseDate
Select5 split(not(isNull(OnlineMovieID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitOnlineMovieId@(NotNull, Null)
Select3 split(not(isNull(OnlineMovieID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitOnlineMovieId2@(NotNull2, Null2)
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['combinedOnPremiseMovies'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Union2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['combinedMovieActors'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
SplitOnlineMovieId@Null sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['NoOnLineMovieId'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
SplitOnlineMovieId2@Null2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['NoOnlineMovieId'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4

source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> vanarsdelCustomerSr
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> fourthCoffeeCustomrSr
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SalesCustomerSr
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StreamingCustomerSr
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SalesAddressSr
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StreamingAddressSr
vanarsdelCustomerSr, fourthCoffeeCustomrSr union(byName: true)~> Union1
SalesCustomerSr, SalesAddressSr join(SalesCustomerSr@CustomerID == SalesAddressSr@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesCustomerSr@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate = SalesCustomerSr@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = SalesCustomerSr@UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
StreamingCustomerSr, StreamingAddressSr join(StreamingCustomerSr@CustomerID == StreamingAddressSr@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = StreamingCustomerSr@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate = StreamingCustomerSr@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = StreamingCustomerSr@UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union2
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['CombinedOnpremisesCustomers'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Union2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['onlineSalesNStreamingCustomers'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
